main event: On May 7, 1960, Mr. Allen P. Bentley observed an unidentified flying object hovering over a nearby field for several minutes before it ascended vertically at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was circular in shape and approximately 20 to 25 feet in diameter., It emitted a reddish glow during the sighting., Mr. Bentley used binoculars to observe the object closely., The object made no sound during its appearance., The case was investigated by Project Blue Book and deemed UNKNOWN with no conventional identification.
sighted object: unidentified flying object hovering in the field
witness description: Mr. Allen P. Bentley, a resident of Bentley, Michigan.
